scripts.build: browserify public/screen-share-page.js -o public/screen-share-page-bundle.js && browserify public/landing-page.js -o public/landing-page-bundle.js && browserify public/rooms-page.js -o public/rooms-page-bundle.js
scripts.start: browserify public/screen-share-page.js -o public/screen-share-page-bundle.js && browserify public/landing-page.js -o public/landing-page-bundle.js && browserify public/rooms-page.js -o public/rooms-page-bundle.js
scripts.devStart: browserify public/screen-share-page.js -o public/screen-share-page-bundle.js && browserify public/landing-page.js -o public/landing-page-bundle.js && browserify public/rooms-page.js -o public/rooms-page-bundle.js && nodemon server.js
